/usr/local/cuda-12.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Xcompiler=-Wall --expt-relaxed-constexpr --expt-extended-lambda -Xcudafe --diag_suppress=186 --generate-code=arch=compute_90,code=[compute_90,sm_90] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/simple_test_sm90.dir/src/simple_test.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/simple_test_sm90.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
